content: end row 73 rs slip 1 k2 decrease k to last 3 sts ssk k1 = 2 sts decrease d = 26 sts next 3 row slip 1 k to end row 77 rs slip 1 k2 decrease k to last 3 sts ssk k1 = 2 sts decrease d row 78 ws slip 1 k to end repeat previous 2 row 3 more times = 18 sts row 85 rs slip 1 k2 decrease k to last 3 sts ssk k1 = 2 sts decrease d repeat previous row 3 more times = 10 sts row 89 rs slip 1 ssk psso *k1 ppso repeat from * 4 more times 2 sts remain on lh needle k2 decrease ppso cut yarn and pull through last st top left semi circle move sts from holder onto lh needle with rs facing join new yarn at middle of heart next row rs slip 1 k29 turn work to ws work row 60 - 89 as for top right semi circle finishing weave in ends wash and dry according to yarn label enjoy practical little heart © heidi kirrmaier page 3 of 4 february 12 2022 abbreviations co = cast on decrease d = decreased increase d = increased k = knit kfb = knit into the front then knit into the back of the same st lh = left hand p = purl ppso = pass previous st over psso = pass slipped st over rh = right hand rs = right side ssk = slip 2 sts separately as if to knit then knit together through back loops st s = stitch es decrease = together ws = wrong side terms of use this design is the property of heidi kirrmaier it is copyrighted and is for personal and non- profit use only meaning you may knit it for yourself a gift or charity you may not sell an item made from this pattern you may not reproduce the pattern or distribute it from a website unless operating under the ravelry consignment agreement retailers may not download or print this pattern for sale or distribution it may not be translated reproduced or circulated in another language purchasing downloading or printing the pattern constitutes agreement with these terms thank you practical little heart © heidi kirrmaier page 4 of 4 february 12 2022
